body_html: @gunan What's the equivalent of #ifdef __SSE3__ in Python? That aside, I really would like default usage of TensorFlow to flush denormals, including if someone downloads and builds from source. It would terrify me if a source-built version of TensorFlow was by default different from the standard binaries. It's not likely to hurt many people, but the people it does hurt will be very unhappy and confused.

body: @gunan What's the equivalent of `#ifdef __SSE3__` in Python?  That aside, I really would like default usage of TensorFlow to flush denormals, including if someone downloads and builds from source.  It would terrify me if a source-built version of TensorFlow was by default different from the standard binaries.  It's not likely to hurt many people, but the people it does hurt will be very unhappy and confused.
